name: Rewind another day
description:
Its that time again 00. Some mad scientist has come up with a crackpot scheme to connect all of the computers around the world. 

I have outfitted you with the latest gadget, a gun concealed in a Walkman. Only problem is I spent 95% of the budget on it so I can only give you one bullet. Luckily you can  press the rewind button to bring the bullet back to you. It has some other bells and whistles as well.

Good Luck

- Y

You will need to use a mouse

Esc -  will display controls

GitHub
